pullrequest.title: New Inertial class: MassMatrix3 with pose offset (#32)

content.raw:
We could:

1. Add the new typedefs to ign-math2 and leave in the old definitions (with a comment about which one to use). 
1. Make a release of ign-math2
1. Deprecrate the old typedefs in ign-math default (will become ign-math3)
1. Remove the old typedefs in ign-math4

Simultaneously:

1. Change the types in gazebo 7 and default to use the new typedefs (I think the change will be ABI compatible).
content.html:
We could:

  1. Add the new typedefs to ign-math2 and leave in the old definitions (with a comment about which one to use).
  2. Make a release of ign-math2
  3. Deprecrate the old typedefs in ign-math default (will become ign-math3)
  4. Remove the old typedefs in ign-math4

Simultaneously:

  1. Change the types in gazebo 7 and default to use the new typedefs (I think the change will be ABI compatible).
